sqlMap.statement: SELECT COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.sndStatusCd IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) ,0) AS "SNDSTATUSCNT0", COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.rcvStatusCd IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) ,0) AS "RCVSTATUSCNT0", COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.sndStatusCd='C' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) ,0) AS "SNDSTATUSCNT1", COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.sndStatusCd NOT IN ('C','S') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) ,0) AS "SNDSTATUSCNT2", COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.rcvStatusCd='C' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) ,0) AS "RCVSTATUSCNT1", COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.rcvStatusCd NOT IN ('C','S') AND t2.sndStatusCd='C' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS "RCVSTATUSCNT2", COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.sndStatusCd='S' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) ,0) AS "SNDSTATUSCNT3", COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.rcvStatusCd='S' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) ,0) AS "RCVSTATUSCNT3" FROM ( SELECT COALESCE((SELECT MAX(transStatusCd) FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIES03 WHERE BjobDmndMsgID=a.BjobDmndMsgID AND sndRcvKind='1' ), COALESCE((SELECT MAX(transStatusCd) FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIES04 WHERE BjobDmndMsgID=a.BjobDmndMsgID AND sndRcvKind='1' ),'F')) AS sndStatusCd, COALESCE((SELECT MAX(transStatusCd) FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIES03 WHERE BjobDmndMsgID=a.BjobDmndMsgID AND sndRcvKind='2' ), COALESCE((SELECT MAX(transStatusCd) FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIES04 WHERE BjobDmndMsgID=a.BjobDmndMsgID AND sndRcvKind='2' ),'F')) AS rcvStatusCd FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIES01 A WHERE A.msgRegDate BETWEEN #searchStartDate# AND #searchEndDate# || '9' ) T2
